meaning_str.bing:
linkv. 成为；变成；开始变得
v. 适合（某人）；（与…）相称；使（人）显得漂亮；使好看
网络. 适宜

适合（某人）；（与…）相称；使（人）显得漂亮；使好看

变得；变成；成为；适合；适宜；与…相称；发生于；临到身上；取得资格；有资格担任；成为…的一部分；使（人）显得漂亮；使好看

sogou-kaoyan.v: 变成; 成为[出现86次)];适合[出现0次)]

1.en: Is Japan trying to become more like an emerging market everyday?
1.cn: 日本是否试着一天比一天变成更像一个新兴市场？

2.en: Vancouver seems to have become its new centre, thanks to its importance as a hub for the production and export of marijuana.
2.cn: 由于温哥华是生产和输出大麻的集散地，看起来它正成为新的帮派中心。

3.en: But even the most disgusting image may become palatable over time, as seems to have been the case in Canada.
3.cn: 但即使是最恶心的禁烟形象长期下去也可能会让人们感到麻木，就像加拿大出现过的这类案子。

1.en: Planet Ocean has become our planet, but if we were wrong?
1.cn: 海洋已经成为我们的一切，但如果我们错了呢?

2.en: One of you, and only one of you will become the next Lancelot.
2.cn: 你们当中仅有一人会成为下一个兰斯洛特。

3.en: You can change the story of your life. You can become someone else.
3.cn: 你可以改变自己的人生，你可以成为别人。

4.en: Who will become part of Farkle nation for a free T-shirt? Yeah!
4.cn: 成为法尔科国一分子者免费获得T恤一件。好呀！

5.en: When we die, our bodies become the grass, and the antelope eat the grass.
5.cn: 我们死后呢，尸体会成为草，而羚羊是吃草的。

6.en: I mean, when I read Euphoria at Midnight, all I wanted to do was become a writer.
6.cn: 我读了《兴奋午夜》后，就一心想成为作家。

7.en: Because if I go home, we're gonna become the Bings. I can't be the Bings.
7.cn: 因为如果我回家，我们会成为宾夫妇，我不能当宾夫妇。

8.en: She's become a beacon of hope for the rebellion. And she has to be eliminated.
8.cn: 她已经成为一盏反叛的希望灯塔了，必须解决掉她。

9.en: Now, I can't force you to see reason. But I will not allow you to become dangerous.
9.cn: 我没法逼你想通道理，但我不允许你成为隐患。

10.en: I always told myself my progression is gonna be Become a rotation player, become a starting point guard, And then win an NBA championship.
10.cn: 我一直对自己说，我的进步历程会是这样，从进入轮换，到成为首发控卫，然后赢得NBA总冠军

11.en: He saved over a thousand men, including the man who would become my husband as it turned out.
11.cn: 他拯救了一千多个人，其中包括后来成为我丈夫的人。

12.en: Son, that was some real racin' out there. How'd you like to become the new face of Dinoco?
12.cn: 孩子，这才是真正的比赛，你想不想成为迪纳哥新的代言人？

13.en: Friends first? That's interesting. You become friends after? No, never done that either.
13.cn: 先做朋友？有意思。你们是事后成为朋友吗？不，从来没有过。

14.en: But who? Who is worthy to be trusted with the secret to limitless power, to become the Dragon Warrior?
14.cn: 但有谁才有资格继承这天下无敌的宝典，成为神龙侠?

15.en: Not everyone can become a great artist, but a great artist can come from anywhere.
15.cn: 并非是谁都能成为伟大的艺术家，不过伟大的艺术家却可能来自任何角落。

16.en: No, it can mean anything. Like all of the sudden you're jealous because I've become the apartment stud.
16.cn: 它可能有很多涵义，例如，你突然眼红我成为这里的猛男。

17.en: It's important to understand because it's what allowed a housing crisis to become a nationwide economic disaster.
17.cn: 这是很重要的概念，因为它会让房地产危机成为全国金融危机。

18.en: I know. Why can't parents just stay parents? You know? Why do they have to become people? Why do they have?
18.cn: 为何父母就不能是父母？为何他们就得成为人间男女？为何他们要？

19.en: The algae have thus become the driving force of the construction, aiming to occupy the best place in the sun.
19.cn: 藻类也成为珊瑚生长的推动力，孜孜不倦地抢占着阳光最强的位置。
